Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Koo shololangakhwo mbu Nyasaye yeshinjia amatsi okhurula mwikulu mana nikhukarusilia ebiamo bikabukhane obukondo bwabio, ne mutsingulu khulimwo nende tsinyaali tsindafu nende tsinzakhanyu, etsiobukoondo bukabukhane, ne etsindi tsimali muno
Ne Mubandu nende tsisolo tsimoolanga nende tsisolo tsindi tsikabukhane obukondo, endio, Toto balia baritsanga Nyasaye Mubasumba bebe nibalia abamanya. Toto Nyasaye niwa Amaani Omulesheli muno
Toto balia basomanga eshitabu shia Nyasaye mana nibalumilila okhulaama mana nibarusia eshihanwa khubilia ebiakhubakabile mubwifisi nohomba mubwang’ang’u basubilanga inganga eyilalisikha tawe
Kho abarunge omurungo kwabu omulaamba , nende okhubametela okhurula khu tsimbabaasi tsistsie. Toto Ye ni Omulesheli muno owokhupa orio inyinji
Ne eshitabu shiakhwakhwishila mubufimbulinishioeshiatoto, shifuchilisania nende bilia abialiho embeli washio, toto Nyasaye yamanya muno Abasumba bebe ne abalolanga muno

Mana nikhuhelesia eshitabu balia abakhwawula mubasumba befu, ne mubo baliho bakholela obubii emioyo chiabu ne balimwo bali hakarikari, ne mubo baliho belushilanga amakhuwa amalayi, khubuchami bwa Nyasaye, obo nibo obulayi obukhongo
Emikunda chilaliwa tawe balinjilamwo balironwa ebirone bieyidhahabu nende ilulu, ne ebifwalo biabu mwo biliba bia hariri
Ne baliboola mbu : “oluyali lwosi nilwa Nyasaye owakhurusiliaho eshibeela , toto Nyasaye wefu ni Omulesheli muno owokhupa orio inyinji.”
Ulia khulwetsimbaasi tsitsie yakhura efwe habaandu okhumenya khatsotso
Ne balia bakhaya balinyoola omulilo kwa jahanam, shibalibusilibwa okhufwamwo tawe, ne shibalitutuyilibwa eshinyasio shiakwo tawe, ne endio nilwa khulirunga buli omukhayi

Ne omo balikhupamwo obuyoka: “Nyasaye wefu Omulesi khurusiemwo khwitsa okhukhola amalayi kalali kalia akakhwakholanga” “shikhwabahelesiamwo ebise biomundu okhwitsulila mana Omwikanyilisi nabetselamwo, kho mana mupile, ne Ababii babula ubahabina.”
